description: '''Belize Nicolau Kazi''' (born 2000), known professionally as '''BB Trickz''' (stylized as '''Bb trickz'''), is a Spanish rapper. She began rapping in 2023, releasing her first two [[extended play]]s (EPs)—''Trickstar'' and ''Sadtrickz''—that year. Her music is known for its humorous and provocative lyrics and its influences from American [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] styles such as [[Brooklyn drill#Bronx drill|sample drill]].
